amendment.description: An amendment numbered 166 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to administer the unfunded priorities list.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to administer the unfunded priorities list.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 258 (Roll no. 440).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 258 (Roll no. 440).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
